segments.text: I notice the boy is really struggling to keep his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to collapse under him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl is eagerly waiting for her cookie, her eyes wide with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so oblivious to everything going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll ever notice the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is just pouring water onto the floor, creating a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit disgusted seeing the water all over the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really reaching far into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so innocent, just waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit disgusted by the mess and the lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR
